title: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has text with a large amount of white space
OB: The text on the Java Source Attachment Preference Page contains excessive white space.
EB: The text on the Java Source Attachment Preference Page should be displayed consistently, similar to other sections on the page.
SR:
1. Open the Java Source Attachment Preference Page.
2. Navigate to the section with the excessive white space.
3. Compare the spacing with other sections on the page for reference.
